snippet: There’s controversy surrounding the nomination of American-born hurdler Tiffany Porter as British team captain in the year of the London Olympics.
abstract: Controversy surrounds the nomination of American-born hurdler Tiffany Porter as British team captain in the year of the London Olympics; Porter, who has had a British passport since birth, is one of many foreign-born athletes in a range of sports to have joined British teams with the London Games looming.
lead_paragraph: There’s controversy surrounding the nomination of American-born hurdler Tiffany Porter as British team captain in the year of the London Olympics.

headline.seo: Tiffany Porter’s Switch to British Track Team Draws Criticism
headline.main: Grumbles for Britain’s Hurdler From Michigan
headline.print_headline: Grumbles As American Is a Hurdler For Britain
